tool_description: Manages and formats citations and references for business documents, ensuring proper attribution and bibliography formatting according to academic and professional standards.

citation_style.description: Citation format: apa, mla, chicago, harvard, or business

source_type.description: Type of source: book, journal, website, report, interview, or database

error_messages: Invalid citation style: Use one of [apa, mla, chicago, harvard, business]
Invalid source type: Use one of [book, journal, website, report, interview, database]
Missing title: Provide a title for the source material
Invalid publication year: Year must be between 1900 and 2030
Invalid URL format: Provide a properly formatted URL for online sources
usage: Specify citation_style, source_type, and title as minimum requirements. Add author_names, publication_year, url, and page_numbers as appropriate for complete citations.

formatted_citation.description: Properly formatted citation in the specified style

in_text_citation.description: In-text citation format for document body

bibliography_entry.description: Complete bibliography or reference list entry
